item.content:encoded:
New actions:

  • Get Document of App Return the file of the frontmost document in the active or chosen app
  • Get/Set Current Folder in Finder Get or set the frontmost Finder folder
  • Get/Set Finder New Window Target Get or set Finder’s default new-window folder
  • Get/Set Audio Device Volume Get or set an audio device’s volume
  • Get/Set Audio Device Mute State Get or set an audio device’s mute state
  • Toggle Dock Folder Expand or collapse a Dock folder
  • Get/Set Dock Position View or change the Dock position
  • Get/Set Accent Color Get or set the system accent color
  • Get/Set Night Shift Color Temperature Get or set Night Shift color temperature
• Fixed the “Run JavaScript on Active Browser Tab” action not working in some cases.

New actions:

  • Show Alert (Extended)
    Shows an alert dialog with multiple buttons and returns which button was clicked.
  • Click Top Notification
    Activates the top visible system notification.
  • Unminimize Windows of Active App
    Unminimizes all windows or the first window of the currently active app.
  • Get/Set Desktop Icons Visibility
    Show, hide, or check visibility status of desktop icons.
  • Get/Set Mouse Pointer Visibility
    Get or set the visibility of the mouse pointer.
  • Center Mouse Pointer
    Centers the mouse pointer on the primary display.
  • Get/Set iOS Notifications Enabled
    Control whether notifications from your iOS device appear on your Mac, if supported.

If you encounter any problems after updating, restart your computer. The Shortcuts app can be a bit buggy.

If you have a Magic Trackpad or Magic Keyboard, it would be amazing if you could run the “Debug” action and send me the output.

New actions:

  • Open URLs in Private Browser Window
    Opens URLs in a private/incognito browser window
  • Get/Set Network Location
    Switch between different network configurations
  • Join Wi-Fi
    Connects to a specified Wi-Fi network
  • Clear Top Notification
    Clears the top visible system notification
  • Get Latest Screenshots
    Returns the most recent screenshots taken with the system screenshot tool
  • Get Slack Workspace
    Retrieves the name of the current Slack workspace

New actions:

  • Get Default Sound Device
    Retrieves the current default sound input or output device
  • Set Default Sound Device
    Changes the default sound input or output device
  • Find Sound Device
    Lists all available sound devices with detailed information
  • Toggle Mission Control
    Shows or hides Mission Control
  • Toggle App Exposé
    Shows or hides all windows of the current app
  • Toggle Launchpad
    Shows or hides the Launchpad app launcher
  • Get Apps Using Secure Input
    Identifies apps that may be blocking keyboard input by not releasing Secure Input mode
